rules_text:
You may discard a card. If you do, draw two cards.
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.
Discard your hand, then draw seven cards. You may put an Edarna planeswalker card from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield.
special_text:
[+2]: You may discard a card. If you do, draw two cards.
[-3]: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.
[-7]: Discard your hand, then draw seven cards. You may put an Edarna planeswalker card from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield.
